reviews.content: Everything except the music player works. Great tweak, design is perfect.
Doesn’t always play well with Axon, but it’s mostly just minor issues. Overall, a great tweak that allows for fun, colorful customization of notifications and widgets. Would recommend.

(iPhone 12)
Works as expected.
only issue i’ve had is that it doesn’t use colors from alternative icons, for example my Telegram icon is set to black but the banner is still blue.
great free alternative to ColorBanners
Looks great. A wonderful addition to the monotonous Notification Center.
My notifications are colorful, I’m running iOS 13.2.3
A little tricky to get the settings I want but it works.
working on unc0ver ios 14.3, the only thing that won’t work is the music player coloring option but not a big deal
Works great! iPhone XS, iOS 13.5. unc0ver 5.0.0.
